text:
Model Heidi Klum has the best Halloween costume again. She dressed up as a terrible alien - it took 12 hours to make-up
01 Nov 2019, 13:11 by Meduza
Every year on Halloween, model Heidi Klum and her young man or husband dress up in some creepy costumes that take a lot of time to create. Last year, Klum and her husband, Tokio Hotel guitarist Tom Kaulitz, portrayed Fiona and Shrek. And in this - the injured astronaut (Kaulitz) and a terrible alien resembling the Frankenstein monster (Klum). They worked on the Klum costume for more than 12 hours!
Attention! If you are scared - do not be afraid.



Noam Galai / Getty Images / Heidi Klum / AFP / Scanpix / LETA


How was the transformation of Heidi Klum
First, make-up artists tried on artificial skin for the face.



After that, Klum dressed in a jumpsuit made of this same artificial leather. Br-r!






(Food break!)



The next step is to apply artificial skin to the face and add details like scars.



Above the back, too, had to work hard.



And here is the head - artificial skin needs to be fixed so that it fits on the "brain".



And here are the final touches: the tubes going to the brain and shoulders are already fixed, and the scars and veins are drawn.



But the main thing is to appear spectacularly!
